original_title: Dora the Explorer: Night Light Adventure
overview: Night or day, Dora's ready for adventure! Help her save the Little Chicks' story time with a night light and rescue Abuela's kitties on a moonlight mission. Plus, help Verde the clean-up truck on his birthday and Gus the Bus on a trip to Music School. Its lights out for Power Off Day, but it's also the Little Chicks' story time! Help Dora get her special Night Light to them so they can read!
title: Dora the Explorer: Night Light Adventure
